metadata.title: CVE-2021-43560 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle in versions 3.11 to 3.11.3, 3.10 to 3.10.7, 3.9to 3.9.10 and earlier unsupported versions. Insufficient capability checksmade it possible to fetch other users' calendar action events.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
